column1: The figures are based on the registration numbers provided by the Dutch Road Traffic Authority (RDW). All vehicles registered on 1 January of each year have been counted

column1: Figures of the vehicle fleet on 1 January 2021 have been added.
The figures for 1 January 2021 have been published with a delay this year due to problems with the distribution of the source files. Furthermore
column2: after receiving the source files
column3: extensive analyses revealed that in the current selection too many vehicles are included. This concerns vehicles with no insurance during the year prior to the reference date. To give an indication
column4: this comprises approximately 2 percent of all motor vehicles
column5: with percentages differing per vehicle category. We are currently working on a report
column6: in which we will describe and quantify the differences between the current method and the selection method we will use in the future. This report will be published later this year. The figures in this table have been calculated using the current method. This means that the data on 1 January 2021 are comparable with the data of previous years.

column1: When will new figures be published?
New figures of the vehicle fleet on 1 January 2022 will be published in February 2022.
